bug.author: randyzwitch
bug.summary: Healthz endpoint hard-coded to 8501/doesn't pick up port specified in CLI?
bug.description: It appears that the healthz endpoint might be hardcoded to 8501 instead of picking up the port number from the CLI ref: <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io/t/streamlit-behind-revese-proxy-doesnt-work-when-you-change-port/4253>https://discuss.streamlit.io/t/streamlit-behind-revese-proxy-doesnt-work-when-you-change-port/4253</denchmark-link>
